item.title: 4D web scrapping part 1
item.description: As I mentioned earlier, I was embarking on my side project (in efforts to improve my JS knowledge). I want to consolidate all our Malaysia’s 4D gaming results into a single hosted app. Thus I needed to find the sources. I know that there are 3 major betting company players: Damacai Magnum Sports Toto Of the 3, both Magnum and Damacai has APIs which I can use. Of these 2, Magnum API is pretty straightforward.
